name: telnyxdotcom-e2e
description: End to end tests for telnyx.com

scripts.setup:local: npm run env:local && npx playwright install && npx playwright install-deps
scripts.docker:build: docker build -t telnyxdotcom-e2e -f Dockerfile $(cat .env | sed '/^$/d' | sed 's@^@--build-arg @g') .
scripts.docker:start: docker run --name telnyxdotcom-e2e -d -p 4029:4029 $(cat .env | sed '/^$/d' | sed 's@^@--env @g') telnyxdotcom-e2e
